climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 💜 GENTLE ON THE PLANET: Contribute to the conservation of ecosystems throughout the world by making the eco-smart switch to Plant Based baby wipes, fully compliant with the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) – which promotes environmentally appropriate, socially beneficial, and economically viable management of the world’s forests.

💜 GENTLE ON BABY'S SKIN: No plastics. No parabens. No alcohol. No synthetics. No harsh chemicals. Purity that parents can trust. Moistened with 99% pure water, our Scented baby wipes are gentle enough for wiping the delicate skin of newborn infants & premature babies.

💜 GOING GREEN MADE EASY: Ordinary wipes & diapers get a bad rap because they pollute our world. Our goal is to bring green products to parents more easily & thus save the planet for future generations. Fully, 100% Plant Based baby towelettes and wipes effectively lessen human impact on the environment. Cruelty-free, degradable & completely honest.

💜 RAPID DECOMPOSITION: Unlike other wipes, these eco-friendly baby wipes are made out of materials sourced straight from the earth. Derived from trees, the all-natural viscose material quickly breaks down & fully disintegrates back into the ground in several months rather than 100+ years.

💜 HAPPINESS GUARANTEED: Big, thick & just as effective as traditional baby wipes, our towelettes are sure to impress. We back every pack with a risk-free guarantee. Full refunds issued for returns within 30 days. Place your order now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love that these are biodegradable and there is very little fragrance if any. Also, very sturdy for being biodegradable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Biodegradable Wipes
reviews.reviewText: So happy to find biodegrade wipes! Very pleased with these all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars All of the above are important

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed surprisingly
reviews.reviewText: Honestly these Biodegradable baby wipes are actually surprisingly good! Personally I have always though that papers wipes were way to soft, and Huggies wipes were way to stiff. Though if i have to choose between those two I would pick Huggies. But these wipes from a brand I had not hear of previous to getting these are a nice mix of both.There not to soft, nor to stiff, there just right. There also longer than they are wide, which makes it very easy to get out of the pack because it always pops the next one out unlike other brands. The scent isn’t strong at all either. I do have a hard time describing it, but it’s almost like a grassy, earthy scent with a hint of flowers that actually smells surprisingly fresh. There definitely moist enough wi try out being completely soaked. Quite frankly I actually really like these wipes! They come out to around 3 bucks a pack, which isn’t terribly expensive, but also not cheap either. But I would say that’s a fair price for something biodegradable and that performs well. Personally I don’t think they are to thin at all as others have stated either. I’m quite likening these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smells nice, biodegradable has me sold!
reviews.reviewText: We don’t use wipes on our baby too frequently only because our newborn’s skin is still too fragile and gets rashes easily. However, occasionally we’ll use them if we have to. We have been using these to wipe his neck rolls to get rid of the sour milk smell. I usually don’t purchase any scented wipes but in this instance I was kind of glad the wipes are scented. These are scented with essential oils so I was a little bit more accepting than if it was to be scented with chemicals. I tried it on my skin first, then used it on baby. His skin did not have any reaction or rashes after use so I decided it was ok to keep using it on him.I like these wipes knowing they won’t be sitting on the landfill for 100+ years! I know these wipes are a little on the thinner side but it works for what we are using these for. If you really need a thicker wipes you can just double up. The fact that these are biodegradable just makes me really like these wipes! Why can’t all wipes be like these?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Might be what you're looking for
reviews.reviewText: Okay the scent is very strong and it lingers. The wipes are very thin too, but if you double then up they work just as well as others. They are biodegradable, and that's why we chose them but they are really thin. They would be a great camping companion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe for landfills and doesn’t rip while using
reviews.reviewText: I have been trying to figure out what I would compare the scent of these wipes to. I just cannot think of it. My husband thinks they smell like a citrus fragrance. I feel like they have a cleaner type smell to them. I say that hesitantly because not in a bad way. As far as wipes go I think they are one of the more perfumed wipes that I have ever used. I wasn’t sure at first how I would feel about it but I actually like the fragrance. It can even be quite helpful with a sensitive stomach like mine changing some very potent diapers.Texture wise they have some raised bumps to them which is helpful for gripping and really cleaning baby bottoms. They are also sturdy and do not rip apart in your hands. I can use one wipe comfortably without worrying about getting my hands dirty or the wipe ripping before I am ready. They are soft and very moist.To know that they are 100% biodegradable and compostable is pretty amazing to me. For something so sturdy I would not expect them to be so good for the environment. The fact that they have made a wipe that is good for the environment but also safe for baby and helpful for mom is pretty impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Strong smell, lots of fragrance
reviews.reviewText: Claim to be safe and eco friendly, but stink of perfume/ fragrance and have unhealthy ingredients.
